Starting at 10AM üïö Watch the #WallStreetOversight hearing live at @SenateBanking.

A year ago today, the world learned George Floyd's name.

We must honor his memory by passing meaningful reforms - reforms that protect Black and brown communities and hold law enforcement accountable for misconduct.

That starts with the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act.

Fed Vice Chair Quarles' job is to check Wall Street's power and hold the biggest banks accountable. But as far as I can tell, he doesn't view standing up to Wall Street as part of his job.

If we want an economy that reflects our values, we can‚Äôt let Wall Street write the rules. https://t.co/4p7mbvoTmY

It's our job to hold Wall Street accountable for putting profits over people - as Chairman, I'm going to make sure they know we‚Äôre watching. https://t.co/Oa7RIeiHAN

Bitcoin‚Äôs value fluctuates at the drop of a tweet. Yesterday, it plummeted 30%.

¬†

Israeli violence against Palestinians protesting the #SheikhJarrah evictions, the assault on Al-Aqsa worshipers during Ramadan, and Hamas‚Äôs indiscriminate rocket attacks are ALL unacceptable.

¬†
The Administration and regional partners need to make de-escalation a priority before more lives are lost.

Tonight we heard President Biden deliver a message of hope to the American people.

In the first 100 days, we took¬†bold action to help Ohioans recover.

Now we work to build on that success, with¬†historic investments in the people who make this country work.

President Biden's #AmericanFamilyPlan recognizes that caregiving IS work.
¬†
That's a huge step towards rebuilding an economy that makes hard work pay off for everyone.

Today, we mark #WorkersMemorialDay and honor all the workers - far too many - who have laid down their lives on the job during the pandemic.

Time for Congress to pass this for ALL workers. #FightFor15

President Biden promised to be the most pro-worker, pro-union president. Here's how he's delivered:

‚úä Supporting the PRO Act and $15 minimum wage

‚úä Naming historic pro-worker nominees

President Biden's first 100 days in office have been nothing short of historic.
 
He promised bold COVID relief. Together, we delivered.
 
I'll always remember passing the American Rescue Plan as the best day of my career in public service.
